name: Boggle: Infinite - Hackathon Version
description:
Entry for the 2020 Hackathon.

Theme: Language

A fun way to practice word recollection and vocabulary. A Boggle style game with Match 3 elements.

=== CONTROLS ===

  • Left Click + Drag = select letters
  • Arrow Keys / WASD = scroll
  • Middle Click / E / 2 = bomb

*Note: The web version of this game is really buggy for some reason, so if you can't get the game to start by pressing 'Enter', try reloading a few times until it works. (same fix if the scrolling doesn't work)
